content.question: The Internet is reshaping traditional economic arrangements by

choices.label: reinforcing the dominance of the central business district for retail sales
expanding the importance of express package delivery systems
increasing the importance of rail transportation as compared to truck transportation
bringing consumers and producers into face-to-face contact

content.answer: expanding the importance of express package delivery systems
